>
[Heartstone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=487)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 203</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This gemstone grants its wearer a +2 item bonus to saving throws.

Each _heartstone_ is powered by the spirit of a specific night hag. If it’s separated from her for 24 hours (or she’s been dead for 24 hours), it becomes a nonmagical gemstone. A _heartstone_ allows the hag to use additional occult innate spells: _[ethereal jaunt](/Spells.aspx?ID=105)_ (9th level) and _[bind soul](/Spells.aspx?ID=21)_ at will, and _[shadow blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273)_ twice per day.

<document level="2" id="action-292" />

**Craft Requirements** You must be a night hag.

</column>

<traits>

</traits>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs=""
>
Skarja's Heartstone
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 89</row>

**Price** 2,500 gp ((1,000 gp when nonmagical))

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This pale gemstone grants its wearer a +2 item bonus to saving throws and the ability to discern a target's alignment (as [_detect alignment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=65), but can detect chaotic, evil, good, and lawful auras simultaneously) at will by peering through the gemstone.

 Like all hag _heartstones_, this gemstone is powered by [Skarja's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2110) spirit. Skarja does not need to wear her _heartstone_ to benefit from its powers, but she cannot use them if she hasn't touched her _heartstone_ in the past 7 days. If Skarja's _heartstone_ is separated from her for more than 7 days (or if she's been dead for 7 days), it becomes a non-magical gemstone. Skarja's _heartstone_ allows her to use additional occult innate spells: [_ethereal jaunt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=105) (9th level) and [_bind soul_](/Spells.aspx?ID=21) at will, [_shadow blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=273) (6th level) twice per day, and [_spirit blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) once per day.

<document level="2" id="action-1287" />
